description:
The girls arrive at a ghost town to retrieve the last Crystal Flower. But there seems to be a bit of trouble, also there might be a clue to where the Crystal Flower might be.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Mieru? Mienai! Yuurei Yashiku e Irasshai
Visible? Invisible? Welcome to the Haunted House
見える? 見えない! 幽霊屋敷へいらっしゃい
